column4: What issues might I run into if I choose AMD64 distro? Will it offer an advantage in speed?
Jack, thx, will take your advise
you won't have some apps like sun's java plugin (they don't offer one).... No, not really.  You'll just be able to use >4gb of ram
you get the java jre, but for a plugin, you'll either need to use icedtea (open source java) or use 32bit firefox
